page.title: 12KINGSWAY CENTRE
page.content: THIS IS A COMPLEX WHICH IS SET IN MARKET STREET. WITHIN THE COMPLEX IS A CINEMA,BINGO HALL,DANCE HALL AND BAR.ENTERTAINMENT IS OFFERED MOST NIGHTS OF THE WEEK WITH THE BINGO HALL BEING OPEN DURING SOME AFTERNOONS. TEENAGERS DANCE THE NIGHT AWAY AT DIGBY'S DISCOTEQUE BUT THE LOWER AGE LIMIT IS 18 YEARS AS THE PREMISES ARS LICENSED AND IT IS ILLEGAL TO ALLOW UNDER AGE DRINKING.LICENCEES HAVE TO PROTECT THEMSELVES AGAINST THOSE WHO MIGHT TRY TO BUY ALCHOHOL BEFORE THE AGE OF EIGHTEEN YEARS.
